sentences.sContent: This time the modules are rectangular but they also can be in a shape of a trapezium and letter L.
sentences.sContent_eng: This time the modules are rectangular but they also can be in a shape of a trapezium and letter L.
sentences.sCn: 这个模块是矩形的但是它们也可以是不规则四边形或像字母L一样。

synos.tran: （英）梯形（等于trapezoid）；（美）[数]不规则四边形；大多角骨

trans.tranOther: a shape with four sides, only two of which are parallel
